message: can you give me summary of leave policy
response:
Here is a summary of the leave policy:

*   **Objective:** To regulate all forms of leaves applicable to employees and outline procedures for granting and taking leaves.
*   **Scope:** Applies to all employees, consultants, retainers, and trainees.
*   **Leave Year:** Financial year (April 1st to March 31st).
*   **Leave Types:**
    *   Annual Leave (AL)
    *   Sick Leave (SL)
    *   Maternity Leave (ML)
    *   Paternity Leave (PL)
    *   Special Leave (SPL)
    *   Optional Leave (OL)
    *   Leave Without Pay (LWP)
    *   Compensatory Off (CO)
    *   Transfer Leaves (TL)
    *   Unauthorized Absence (UA)
*   **Annual Leave (AL):**
    *   Employees, Consultants, and Retainers: 30 days per financial year, calculated pro rata from the date of joining. Credited on the date of joining during the first year and subsequently on April 1st of each financial year. Can be availed for full or half-day. A maximum of 12 days can be taken at a time, and leave exceeding 12 days requires approval from the Business Head / Terminal Head / CEO / Competent Authority. For availing 7 days or more leave, at least 10 days’ prior notice is required. Unavailed leaves lapse at the end of each financial year.
    *   Trainees: 10 days per financial year, calculated pro rata from the date of joining.
*   Leave cannot be claimed as a matter of right, and the discretion to grant or refuse leave lies solely with the Competent Authority. Prior approval is required for availing any leave. All leaves exclude weekly offs and paid holidays unless specified otherwise.
*   Combination of Sick Leave & Annual Leave with Maternity leave may be permitted provided the employee submits application along with Medical Certificate in support. Sick leave and Annual leave can only be combined on exhaustion of Maternity leave, Sick Leave & Annual Leave, in that order.
*   Leave balance will be carried forward in case of employee transfer to another group company.
*   Encashment of unavailed Annual leave for maximum up to 30 days will be done at the time of full and final settlement on a pro rata basis at the time of retiring / death case.
*   The Leave Policy is effective from December 1st, 2020, excluding Optional Leave, which is applicable from April 1st, 2021.
*   Unauthorized absence is treated as serious misconduct and may result in disciplinary action.
